Vase shape when closed. Color photograph of a formal flower arrangement (mostly red roses) with a blank green background. Lawrence D. Rouse Inc. with addresses in St. Albans and Wantaugh on Long Island, NY. Printer: Messenger Corp., Auburn, Indiana.
